attributes.action: Vet EVERY migrant that attempts to enter the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The British people want to see their country's borders strengthened.
Vet EVERY migrant that attempts to enter the UK now!
attributes.background:
Over 7400 migrants have made the dangerous Channel crossing in 2021.
Every migrant that attempts to enter the UK should be vetted.
We urge the Government to put in place a system where EVERYONE migrant attempting our country is vetted thoroughly.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about migration into the UK, however it's not clear what specific checks or tests you want migrants to be subjected to as part of this 'vetting'. 

In any case, migrants entering the UK are already required to undergo certain checks by UK Border Patrol. You can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/immigration-rules/immigration-rules-part-1-leave-to-enter-or-stay-in-the-uk.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577927
